CRW_Engrim |guid = c0d8cf7b-fc5f-4ffb-8419-e5e953090732 }} '''Eld Engrim''' is a character and recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background {{Description|Eld Engrim appears to be in sound condition, though his waxed jacket is soaked through. He appraises you with bleary-eyed amusement.}} A deck hand reeking of rum, Eld Engrim is a veteran of the seas, together with all the usual accouterments: A smile lacking teeth, balding head, waxed jacket... Of note is the fact that he's apparently an acquaintance of [Durance](/durance/). ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [Helping Hands](/helpingHands/) |none = |other = * A priest of [Magran](/magran/) has some unique dialogue with Eld Engrim. * Eld Engrim will have a reaction regarding the outcome of [Durance](/durance/)'s questline in {{poe1}}. * He has some dialogue with [Vela](/vela/), and she has taken to calling him "Uncle Engrim". |crew = {{crewrank|1|cannoneer}}
{{crewrank|1|surgeon}}
Personality: Drunkard, Religious }} ## =Quests = * [Helping Hands](/helpingHands/): Eld Engrim can be retrieved in the course of the quest. ## Dialogue Introductory dialogue * '''Eld Engrim:''' ''"Aye. Magran learns us poor bastards that a little excitement's good for the heart."'' * As a [priest](/priest/) of [Magran](/magran/) ** '''Watcher:''' ''"The flames reveal all in time, brother."'' * If [Durance](/durance/) was recruited, but was killed or you didn't convince him of Magran and Woedica's plot: ** '''Watcher:''' ''"The last Magranite to travel with me wasn't quite up to the goddess' challenge."'' ** '''Engrim:''' ''"Aye. Poor Durance. May the mad whoreson see better days come the next turn of the Wheel."'' * If [Durance](/durance/) was recruited, wasn't killed, and you convinced him of Magran and Woedica's plot: ** '''Watcher:''' ''"The last Magranite to travel with me almost went mad because of his goddess' trials."'' ** '''Engrim:''' ''"Aye, but almost mad ain't fully mad. Ah, Old Durance. The goddess shan't forge another like him in our lives, captain."'' {{hr}} If [Vela](/vela/) is present * '''Vela:''' ''"Can we go back on the ship now?"
Vela rocks back on the heels of her feet, watching you both.'' * '''Watcher:''' ''"Vela, don't let Engrim be a bad influence while I'm gone."'' * '''Eld Engrim:''' ''"That's unkind. Yer the one decided to pluck this wean from the wilds of [Eir Glanfath](/eirGlanfath/). Blame that stone steward of yers for bringing the furry maid along."'' * If the Watcher is an [orlan](/orlan/) ** '''Eld Engrim:''' ''"Eh... no slight to yer kind, of course, captain."
He chuckles and nods in your direction.'' * '''Vela:''' ''"Uncle Engrim, you promised me ale."'' * '''Eld Engrim:''' ''"Later, sweetie. Uncle Engrim's thirsty, too."
He absentmindedly taps on his chest, near his heart, sounding the thunk of something metal beneath the priest's jacket.'' {{hr}} Banter with [Irrena](/irrena/) upon approaching the campfire: * '''Eld Engrim:''' ''"I'll boil up some water. We'll have a spy at that leg of yers."'' * '''Irrena:''' ''"Should have seen me with that barrel, Engrim. I showed it who's boss."'' * '''Eld Engrim:''' ''"Mm. Magran gives some of us simpler trials than others."'' {{hr}} Banter with [Beodul](/beodul/) upon approaching the campfire: * '''Eld Engrim:''' ''"Should have known you'd come out of this in one piece, you old crank."'' * '''Beodul:''' ''"I'd rather die than let ye savor the ship's last drop of ale."'' {{hr}} Banter with [Vela](/vela/) upon approaching the campfire: * '''Eld Engrim:''' ''"May be time to wrangle a boar, afore the weakness of hunger sets in."'' * '''Vela:''' ''"Boars are mean!"'' * '''Eld Engrim:''' ''"Aye, maid, but I'm hungrier than they are mean."'' ## Gallery male_human_r_sm.png | Eld Engrim's crew portrait [Category:Vilario's Rest characters](/categoryVilariosRestCharacters/) [Category:Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire crew members](/categoryPillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/)
